title: Increased buying power​​
content: Bulloak margin accounts provide up to 4x leverage for day-trade buying power and 2x leverage for overnight buying power. You must have at least $2,000 in equity to qualify.​​

title: Extensive product access​
content: With a Bulloak margin account, you can trade stocks, ETFs, options and participate in IPOs across multiple devices

title: Stay connected 24/7
content: Our customer service representatives are on standby 24/7 in-app for your inquiries.
